attributes.action: Allow the Adoption Agencies of the Catholic Church to be exempt from the equality laws of 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Catholic Church holds firmly to the belief that children should be brought up in a family with a mother and a father. This can not obviously happen in a homosexual relationship. Therefore the Church should be allowed to carry on as normal and refer gay couples on to other adoption agencies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
